mapper.select: select memberId ,memberPwd ,memberName ,memberPhone ,memberBirth ,to_char(signupDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as signupDate ,memberEmail ,memberPoint ,photoname ,savefile ,myintro From MemberInfo Where memberId = #{memberId}
select memberId ,memberName From memberInfo Where memberPwd =#{memberPwd} and emailchecked = 'y' and memberId =#{memberId} and memberLevel !='Z'
mapper.delete: delete From MemberInfo Where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPwd =#{memberPwd}
